## initializeRequestProperties() function

初始化请求的公共属性（startTime, requestId 等） Initialize common request properties (startTime, requestId, etc.)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function initializeRequestProperties(ctx: KoattyContext, requestId: string): {
    startTimeInitialized: boolean;
    requestIdInitialized: boolean;
};
```
